title: DANISH.MUSIC.CHART.IFPI.P3.Tjeklisten.Week.7.2008
description:
DANISH.MUSIC.CHART.IFPI.P3.Tjeklisten.Week.7.2008.nfo

10 February, 2008
--

On 29 January 2008, a court order on behalf of IFPI (Denmark) ordered the danish ISP "DMT2" (Tele2) to block TPB!

And this is the response:
YOU SUCK IFPI!


Note to IFPI:
If you are reading this you are violating your own court order!

Note to both IFPI and the danish court sytem:
Try this link in a few days when this torrent has replicated: <a href="
http://www.google.com/search?q=DANISH.MUSIC.CHART.IFPI.P3.Tjeklisten" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.google.com/search?q=DANISH.MUSIC.CHART.IFPI.P3.Tjeklisten</a>

It seems like you still have a few websites left to block!
What are you going to do about it? Will you also try to block all those websites?
And what about google.com? Will you also try to get a court order to block Google?

Why dont you just give up?


Note to APG (danish pirate hunters):
If you are reading this you are violating the intent of a court order!

THE PIRATE BAY IS APG FREE!

--

Support the DANISH cause by downloading this torrent and keep sharing it.
Thx to the seeders of last weeks torrent! You did a good job sharing it!

This is my last torrent on this subject.

Feel free to continue the 'tradition' of uploading the chart weekly.

SIGNED
ifpi_sucks
